00034 // Custom validator defintions
00035 namespace boost { namespace program_options {
00036 
00037 void validate(boost::any &v, const Strings &values, int64_t *, int) {
00038   validators::check_first_occurrence(v);
00039   const std::string &s = validators::get_single_string(values);
00040   char *last;
00041   int64_t result = strtoll(s.c_str(), &last, 0);
00042 
00043   if (s.c_str() == last)
00044     throw invalid_option_value(s);
00045 
00046   switch (*last) {
00047     case 'k':
00048     case 'K': result *= 1000LL;         break;
00049     case 'm':
00050     case 'M': result *= 1000000LL;      break;
00051     case 'g':
00052     case 'G': result *= 1000000000LL;   break;
00053     case '\0':                          break;
00054     default: throw invalid_option_value(s +": unknown suffix");
00055   }
00056   v = any(result);
00057 }
00058 
00059 void validate(boost::any &v, const Strings &values, double *, int) {
00060   validators::check_first_occurrence(v);
00061   const std::string &s = validators::get_single_string(values);
00062   char *last;
00063   double result = strtod(s.c_str(), &last);
00064 
00065   if (s.c_str() == last)
00066     throw invalid_option_value(s);
00067 
00068   switch (*last) {
00069     case 'k':
00070     case 'K': result *= 1000LL;         break;
00071     case 'm':
00072     case 'M': result *= 1000000LL;      break;
00073     case 'g':
00074     case 'G': result *= 1000000000LL;   break;
00075     case '\0':                          break;
00076     default: throw invalid_option_value(s +": unknown suffix");
00077   }
00078   v = any(result);
00079 }
00080 
00081 void validate(boost::any &v, const Strings &values, int32_t *, int) {
00082   validate(v, values, (int64_t *)0, 0);
00083   int64_t res = any_cast<int64_t>(v);
00084 
00085   if (res > INT32_MAX || res < INT32_MIN) {
00086     const std::string &s = validators::get_single_string(values);
00087     throw invalid_option_value(s +": number out of range of 32-bit integer");
00088   }
00089   v = any((int32_t)res);
00090 }
00091 
00092 void validate(boost::any &v, const Strings &values, uint16_t *, int) {
00093   validate(v, values, (int64_t *)0, 0);
00094   int64_t res = any_cast<int64_t>(v);
00095 
00096   if (res > UINT16_MAX) {
00097     const std::string &s = validators::get_single_string(values);
00098     throw invalid_option_value(s +": number out of range of 16-bit integer");
00099   }
00100   v = any((uint16_t)res);
00101 }

00108 void
00109 parse(command_line_parser &parser, const PropertiesDesc &desc,
00110       variables_map &result, const PropertiesDesc *hidden,
00111       const PositionalDesc *p, bool allow_unregistered) {
00112   try {
00113     PropertiesDesc full(desc);
00114 
00115     if (hidden)
00116       full.add(*hidden);
00117 
00118     parser.options(full);
00119 
00120     if (p)
00121       parser.positional(*p);
00122 
00123 #if BOOST_VERSION >= 103500
00124     if (allow_unregistered)
00125       store(parser.allow_unregistered().run(), result);
00126     else
00127       store(parser.run(), result);
00128 #else
00129     store(parser.run(), result);
00130 #endif
00131   }
00132   catch (std::exception &e) {
00133     HT_THROW(Error::CONFIG_BAD_ARGUMENT, e.what());
00134   }
00135 }

00140 void
00141 Properties::load(const String &fname, const PropertiesDesc &desc,
00142                  bool allow_unregistered) {
00143   m_need_alias_sync = true;
00144 
00145   try {
00146     std::ifstream in(fname.c_str());
00147 
00148     if (!in)
00149       HT_THROWF(Error::CONFIG_BAD_CFG_FILE, "%s", strerror(errno));
00150 
00151 
00152 #if BOOST_VERSION >= 103500
00153     parsed_options parsed_opts = parse_config_file(in, desc, allow_unregistered);
00154     store(parsed_opts, m_map);
00155     for (size_t i=0; i<parsed_opts.options.size(); i++) {
00156       if (parsed_opts.options[i].unregistered && parsed_opts.options[i].string_key != "")
00157         m_map.insert(Map::value_type(parsed_opts.options[i].string_key, Value(parsed_opts.options[i].value[0], false)));
00158     }
00159 #else
00160     store(parse_config_file(in, desc), m_map);
00161 #endif
00162 
00163       }
00164   catch (std::exception &e) {
00165     HT_THROWF(Error::CONFIG_BAD_CFG_FILE, "%s: %s", fname.c_str(), e.what());
00166   }
00167 }
00168 
00169 void
00170 Properties::parse_args(int argc, char *argv[], const PropertiesDesc &desc,
00171                        const PropertiesDesc *hidden, const PositionalDesc *p,
00172                        bool allow_unregistered) {
00173   // command_line_parser can't seem to handle argc = 0
00174   const char *dummy = "_";
00175 
00176   if (argc < 1) {
00177     argc = 1;
00178     argv = (char **)&dummy;
00179   }
00180   HT_TRY("parsing arguments",
00181     command_line_parser parser(argc, argv);
00182     parse(parser, desc, m_map, hidden, p, allow_unregistered));
00183 }
00184 
00185 void
00186 Properties::parse_args(const std::vector<String> &args,
00187                        const PropertiesDesc &desc, const PropertiesDesc *hidden,
00188                        const PositionalDesc *p, bool allow_unregistered) {
00189   HT_TRY("parsing arguments",
00190     command_line_parser parser(args);
00191     parse(parser, desc, m_map, hidden, p, allow_unregistered));
00192 }

00195 // As of boost 1.38, notify will segfault if anything is added to
00196 // the variables_map by means other than store, which is too limiting.
00197 // So don't call notify after add/setting properties manually or die
00198 void Properties::notify() {
00199   boost::program_options::notify(m_map);
00200 }

00203 void Properties::alias(const String &primary, const String &secondary,
00204                        bool overwrite) {
00205   if (overwrite)
00206     m_alias_map[primary] = secondary;
00207   else
00208     m_alias_map.insert(std::make_pair(primary, secondary));
00209 
00210   m_need_alias_sync = true;
00211 }
00212 
00213 
00214 void Properties::sync_aliases() {
00215   if (!m_need_alias_sync)
00216     return;
00217 
00218   foreach(const AliasMap::value_type &v, m_alias_map) {
00219     Map::iterator it1 = m_map.find(v.first);
00220     Map::iterator it2 = m_map.find(v.second);
00221 
00222     if (it1 != m_map.end()) {
00223       if (it2 == m_map.end())           // secondary missing
00224         m_map.insert(std::make_pair(v.second, (*it1).second));
00225       else if (!(*it1).second.defaulted())
00226         (*it2).second = (*it1).second;  // non-default primary trumps
00227       else if (!(*it2).second.defaulted())
00228         (*it1).second = (*it2).second;  // otherwise use non-default secondary
00229     }
00230     else if (it2 != m_map.end()) {      // primary missing
00231       m_map.insert(std::make_pair(v.first, (*it2).second));
00232     }
00233   }
00234   m_need_alias_sync = false;
00235 }

00237 // need to be updated when adding new option type
00238 String Properties::to_str(const boost::any &v) {
00239   if (v.type() == typeid(String))
00240     return boost::any_cast<String>(v);
00241 
00242   if (v.type() == typeid(uint16_t))
00243     return format("%u", (unsigned)boost::any_cast<uint16_t>(v));
00244 
00245   if (v.type() == typeid(int32_t))
00246     return format("%d", boost::any_cast<int32_t>(v));
00247 
00248   if (v.type() == typeid(int64_t))
00249     return format("%llu", (Llu)boost::any_cast<int64_t>(v));
00250 
00251   if (v.type() == typeid(double))
00252     return format("%g", boost::any_cast<double>(v));
00253 
00254   if (v.type() == typeid(bool)) {
00255     bool bval = boost::any_cast<bool>(v);
00256     return bval ? "true" : "false";
00257   }
00258   if (v.type() == typeid(Strings)) {
00259     const Strings *strs = boost::any_cast<Strings>(&v);
00260     return format_list(*strs);
00261   }
00262   if (v.type() == typeid(Int64s)) {
00263     const Int64s *i64s = boost::any_cast<Int64s>(&v);
00264     return format_list(*i64s);
00265   }
00266   if (v.type() == typeid(Doubles)) {
00267     const Doubles *f64s = boost::any_cast<Doubles>(&v);
00268     return format_list(*f64s);
00269   }
00270 
00271   return format("value of type '%s'", demangle(v.type().name()).c_str());
00272 }
00273 
00274 void
00275 Properties::print(std::ostream &out, bool include_default) {
00276   foreach(const Map::value_type &kv, m_map) {
00277     bool isdefault = kv.second.defaulted();
00278 
00279     if (include_default || !isdefault) {
00280       out << kv.first <<'='<< to_str(kv.second.value());
00281 
00282       if (isdefault)
00283         out <<" (default)";
00284 
00285       out << std::endl;
00286     }
00287   }
00288 }
